text: The Bhonsale Koli (also spelled as Bhonsle Koli, Bhosle Koli, Bhosale Koli) is a Clan (Gotra, Kutumb) of the Koli caste found in the Indian states of Maharashtra, Goa and Karnataka and the Union Territory of the Dadra and Nagar Haveli and nearby areas. The Bhonsale Kolis are divided into sixteen subclans and are landlords. == References == == Other websites == *Mahadev Koli clans of Maharashtra Category:Koli clans
title: Bhonsale Koli
